Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Well well, I am here at last.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Estate Butler', 3: 'The dismay you caused on your path here... Is a stain on this estate...'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Mr. Butler, if you truly find this unforgivable, why didn't you step out earlier to stop me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Protecting yourself, that is the very last order of your master, yes?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Humans, simple to a point. How boring.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Come out. Let me test your mettle. You might still be useful.', 4: '1'}
